title: Make link reference frame relative to child joint

content.raw:
Joint's can be defined relative to the parent link, with <use_parent_model_frame>.
It would be convenient to add a similar tag to the links, so the link pose can be defined relative to the parent joint. This would mirror the format of URDF.

Right, now to get this behavior, a frame must be added to every link and joint to propagate the reference frames, which is a bit messy and prone to user mistakes.
